{
  "id": 796,
  "name": "John",
  "surname": "Doe",

  "age": 30,

  "status": "Active",
  "sum": 1000,
  "alreadyPaid": 500,
  "created_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "manager": {
    "id": "deserunt cillum eiusmod laboris adipisicing",
    "email": "ul",
    "name": "fugiat irure sunt consec",
    "surname": "ali",
    "last_login": "2000-02-07T19:56:29.513Z",
    "is_active": true,
    "image": "non ipsum dolore officia",
    "role": "aute officia"
  },
  "group": "Group A",
  "comments": [
    {
      "text": "Good student",
      "author": "Default",
      "createdAt": "2025-02-28T16:40:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "text": "Good student",
      "author": "Default",
      "createdAt": "2025-02-28T16:40:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "utm": "utm_source=google",
  "msg": "Hello"
}
